body_html:
Same issue Ubuntu 18.04
CUDA9.2
cuDNN v7.2.1
tensorflow-gpu 1.10, also tested with 1.8
All libraries expected by tensorflow are 9.0 instead of 9.2, (e.g. libcublas.so.9.0, libcurand.so.9.0, libcufft.so.9.0, libcufft.so.9.0, etc.

I'll appreciate your guide to know how to solve this issue.

body:
Same issue Ubuntu 18.04
CUDA9.2
cuDNN v7.2.1
tensorflow-gpu 1.10, also tested with 1.8
All libraries expected by tensorflow are 9.0 instead of 9.2, (e.g. libcublas.so.9.0, libcurand.so.9.0, libcufft.so.9.0, libcufft.so.9.0, etc.

I'll appreciate your guide to know how to solve this issue.
